description: While the SNP and Green administration rent cap policy had the best of intentions for tenants, it could have stymied the development of thousands of homes and in the long run exacerbate housing pressures. It comes amid an increase in the popularity of private rented homes.

title: Parrot reunites with ‘love of his life’ family dog after disappearing in storm
